name: CommunicationRequest
title: CommunicationRequest
description: A request to convey information; e.g. the CDS system proposes that an alert be sent to a responsible provider, the CDS system proposes that the public health agency be notified about a reportable condition.

elements.name: CommunicationRequest
elements.description: A request to convey information; e.g. the CDS system proposes that an alert be sent to a responsible provider, the CDS system proposes that the public health agency be notified about a reportable condition.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: Business identifiers assigned to this communication request by the performer or other systems which remain constant as the resource is updated and propagates from server to server.

elements.name: basedOn
elements.description: A plan or proposal that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this request.

elements.name: replaces
elements.description: Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request.

elements.name: groupIdentifier
elements.description: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition, prescription or similar form.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the proposal or order.

elements.name: statusReason
elements.description: Captures the reason for the current state of the CommunicationRequest.

elements.name: category
elements.description: The type of message to be sent such as alert, notification, reminder, instruction, etc.

elements.name: priority
elements.description: Characterizes how quickly the communication must be acted upon. Includes concepts such as stat, urgent, routine.

elements.name: doNotPerform
elements.description: If true indicates that the CommunicationRequest is asking for the specified action to *not* occur.

elements.name: medium
elements.description: A channel that was used for this communication (e.g. email, fax).

elements.name: subject
elements.description: The patient or group that is the focus of this communication request.

elements.name: about
elements.description: Other resources that pertain to this communication request and to which this communication request should be associated.

elements.name: encounter
elements.description: The Encounter during which this CommunicationRequest was created or to which the creation of this record is tightly associated.

elements.name: payload
elements.description: Text, attachment(s), or resource(s) to be communicated to the recipient.

elements.name: occurrenceDateTime
elements.description: The time when this communication is to occur.

elements.name: occurrencePeriod
elements.description: The time when this communication is to occur.

elements.name: authoredOn
elements.description: For draft requests, indicates the date of initial creation. For requests with other statuses, indicates the date of activation.

elements.name: requester
elements.description: The device, individual, or organization who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation.

elements.name: recipient
elements.description: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, care team or device) which is the intended target of the communication.

elements.name: sender
elements.description: The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, or device) which is to be the source of the communication.

elements.name: reasonCode
elements.description: Describes why the communication event is occurring.

elements.name: reasonReference
elements.description: Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request.

elements.name: note
elements.description: Comments made about the request by the requester, subject, or other participants.
